mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveStudentDetailList */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" FROM FRST.STD_DETAIL WHERE STCD <> '09' LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT /* RetrieveTotalCountStudentDetailList */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.STD_DETAIL WHERE STCD <> '09'

SELECT /* RetrieveStudentDetail */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" FROM FRST.STD_DETAIL WHERE STD_ID = #{studentID} AND STCD <> '09'
SELECT /* GetLastStudentID */ STD_ID AS "studentID" FROM FRST.STD_DETAIL WHERE STCD <> '09' ORDER BY STD_ID DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterStudentDetail */ INTO FRST.STD_DETAIL ( STD_ID , FRST_NM , LAST_NM , NICK_NM , GENDER , DOB , POB , ADDR , PHONE , EMAIL , PASSWD , IMG_URL , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{studentID} , COALESCE(#{firstName}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastName}, '') , COALESCE(#{nickname}, '') , COALESCE(#{gender}, '') , COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{address}, '') , COALESCE(#{phone}, '') , COALESCE(#{email}, '') , COALESCE(#{passwd}, '') , COALESCE(#{imageUrl}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateNewsEvent */ FRST.NEWS_EVENT SET TITLE = COALESCE(#{title}, TITLE) , CONTENT_HTML = COALESCE(#{contentHtml}, CONTENT_HTML) , CONTENT_DESC = COALESCE(#{contentDesc}, CONTENT_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) WHERE NEVNT_ID = #{newsEventID}
